website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality, well-made set from a reputable brand ideal for toddlers and young kids.
pros: Consumers appreciate the quality construction and durability
We love that its ability to adjust means it works for about ages 2-7
Base includes two built-in drink holders
cons: Sometimes the unit slips during play and the height needs readjusted

website_summaries.verdict: Active little ones will love this adjustable basketball hoop. With a surprisingly sturdy construction and adjustable height, this option suits a variety of ages.
pros: Generous height adjustment allows kids from 2 to 8 years old to practice their dunking skills
Features a high quality, extra wide backboard, breakaway rim, and woven net
Base comes with 2 drink holders so there's no need for the action to stop when it's time to hydrate

customer_reviews.title: Does not lock in position
customer_reviews.text: It has grooves so you can adjust the height. It doesn't click into position. My kids enjoy it, but I can't make it taller because it doesn't stay. If someone from the company sees this and wants to send me a new one, please let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Real Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect! I researched several basketball hoops and narrowed it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! I researched several basketball hoops and narrowed it down to two. Sooo happy that I chose this one! It is durable, made of good quality and it looks amazing. My seven year old son, ten year old daughter, my husband and I all play with this. We were all surprised at how tall it really is once assembled and how nice it looks. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: nymom02

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay at height
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas. Every thing looks good, but the plastic clamps to keep the hoop on different heights does not hold it up at all. It just falls to the very lowest one everytime. Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Michaud

customer_reviews.title: The clasp don’t hold the height in place
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old son LOVES basketball and his other hoop set was getting too small. So we got him this taller one. For two weeks adjusting the height was no problem. But as of today it’s impossible for the clasps to keep its height in place. I’ve read other reviews to use duct tape but that’s a huge inconvenience when my son literally wants to change the height 5 times a day. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jariah

customer_reviews.title: doesn't stay up
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for a week, but now it's a total disappointment. The clips are not holding the basketball hoop up at all. Every time we shoot the ball, the hoop goes down. I am constantly adjusting it up and down. The second you try to adjust it, the clips come loose. Thought it would last years, but it hasn't even lasted a week. It needs to have tighter clips to keep the hoop up. disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: 4fam

customer_reviews.title: It is so easy to adjust up and down
customer_reviews.text: My 2 kiddos (4 & 7) loves this hoop!! It is so easy to adjust up and down, and a regular size ball will also fit into the net (although I recommend a smaller ball for young kids!). My husband filled the base with sand, and we can still easily move it in and out of the garage, it does not fall over when kids try to "dunk". Awesome hoop, better than the one Little Tikes have I think.
customer_reviews.author: S.N.

customer_reviews.title: very easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Adjustable height, very easy to adjust. My 2 1/2 year old loves it. We have it at the lowest setting and he can't quite touch the net yet. The ball provided is VERY soft and lightweight, it will not hurt if it hits them in the head. You can add water or sand to it, but it holds fine in my carpeted living room without it. It comes with a net that does look sturdy. There's two ball/bottle holder on the base of the hoop. The pole is thick and sturdy. Very well built.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Saephan

customer_reviews.title: Great hoop!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome hoop, but as other reviewers note the ball is poor quality. The net stretches and a size 3 soccer ball fits perfectly! Eventually we will go buy a new basketball but for now it is soccer ball. For anyone ordering this as a surprise, my package came in the original package, so it had a picture of the basketball hoop, etc, on it. Thankfully my child didn't see it before I got it snuck inside and wrapped. My child is almost 4 years and is 42" tall. We set this at the 2nd setting for her and it's the perfect size. I also like how the water in the base makes it very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old always wants this on the highest level, but sadly, the plastic supports meant to hold the goal post in place just pop right back out when you try to insert them in the slots. There's nothing to lock them in place. We have it duct taped at the moment to hold it up. There are other b-ball goals that better quality for a little bit more $.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Ball doesn't come inflated.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the kids. I would have given 5 stars but the ball that comes with it isn't inflated. You will need an inflator kit before this product arrives. My kids were disappointed that they couldn't play with this right away.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great "first" hoop
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in time for christmas and is such a big hit with my 5 year old! He "plays" basketball on a Saturday at school, but the hoops are high and he gets worn out. This will definatly build his confidence to go to the next level. Its very sturdy and sand is working best for us as a stabilizer due to cold weather, but can still be moved. Dosn't feel like a "little kids" plastic toy, which I was concerned about. The ball included is light and not very basketball like, but, perfect for shooting and he finds it easier to use than a small basketball for now. a really great find!
customer_reviews.author: Mali

customer_reviews.title: COULD BE BETTER...little details matter
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, the item is study and has been a pretty good buy. I don't move change the heights often because child is supposed to grow with it. So far so good. However, the design for the rim/hoop is pretty terrible as it does not hold the net in place. You will have to use tape or something to tape it down as it keep falling off or you use without the net. In all, 4 star is good enough. I have had it for a couple of months and so far so good. Would update as required.
customer_reviews.author: King Michael

customer_reviews.title: After one day using it, the hoop will not ...
customer_reviews.text: After one day using it, the hoop will not stay up, keeps falling down..had to use duct tape...Too much money for this to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great basketball hoop!
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy basketball hoop. I purchased it for my husband to use for physical therapy! He needs to work on lifting his arms up high. He shoots hoops from his wheelchair and I like that it has several height adjustments. When he masters one height I can move it up another height!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slam dunk for our grandson!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy product. Our grandson loves it! It has adjustable height option and break away rim. The break away rim was very stiff at first but easier as time goes. Stands strong outside even against high wind after filling the base with sand. Only complaint is loops of the net sometimes come loose with use. There are snap closures to hold it down yet sometimes the loops do release. This doesn't hinder my grandson in any way :) The ball is the perfect size for my 4-year-old. It is a toy that will last awhile and grow with him.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was late. Showed up in a busted box. Had scratches on it. didn't have any stickers. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: It does not work! The height adjustment thing does not work and now just falls to the bottom. I have tried contacting the seller multiple times for a refund and/or another one and have not heard back!
customer_reviews.author: Zhmd

customer_reviews.title: Great for our almost 5 year old son
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our almost 5 year old son. He had a cute, smaller one and the rim just didn't work as well and the net was always coming off. This is perfect. It is sturdy, easily adjustable, and easy to move outside or inside depending on where we want to play. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I kid loves this
customer_reviews.text: We decided to get the fisher price version because it doesn't go high enough. This one does and it is great. My kid still uses the lower height but as he grows, it will be great. Sometimes, I raise it up so I can shoot on it when he is not around. It is easy to adjust and store. We added some water in the back and some sand on top to keep it sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Davo301

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great little set for our 3yo. It’s currently in his room during the winter even! Don’t like how the ball falls from the hoop & hits the base to bounce in different directions but we knew that from the video.
customer_reviews.author: Manda

customer_reviews.title: Good hoop, get a different ball
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my son (3). The ball that comes with it is very light so you may want to get a different ball with some weight to help with aim. Otherwise it is great! The parents have just as fun as the kids.
customer_reviews.author: George Morrison

customer_reviews.title: great for age 2+ my sons enjoyed it
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to assemble, no screws needed. Without water in the base, the basketball hoop does wobble a lot. The build quality is alright, just your standard Step2 quality, if you own any of their products. Medium thick plastic, you can bend it if you use a little bit more force, but I doubt the kids can bend it.
customer_reviews.author: Yue J

customer_reviews.title: Construction Questionable
customer_reviews.text: The bracket that holds the pole from sliding down does not work properly. Not great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R. Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Some father son bonding time love watching them
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our son for Christmas not sure who likes it more him or daddy lol. Some father son bonding time love watching them. Son is still trying to learn how to shoot. This goes up pretty high which I like and the hoop is large for small ones. Great for teaching little ones to shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: It's a good product for my child but the clips that hold ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product for my child but the clips that hold extension on top are not as strong cuz my son pulled them down and now they don't click when u extend the top bit but it stays stable though. It's not the best but it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Abdul Syed

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: You have to be careful with the part you adjust the post with. If you pull it to far out to adjust the height (like I did) you will need duct tape or a zip tie to keep it from sliding down.
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: It grows with your child!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old grandson loved his basketball set! He was so excited. I selected it because it is adjustable as he gets taller. I had also ordered a set of 2 extra basketballs.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: we are happy.
customer_reviews.text: Our 4 year old (who is about 43") loves this. It's one of the few toys we can get her that she doesn't tower over within a few months because of the adjustable base. Only con is that the ball is sorta flimsy but for the price, we are happy.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Says

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old granddaughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: Our 4 year old granddaughter always wants to play basketball with the older kids when we go to the park. Although they are very sweet and let her play with them, she never makes a basket. We bought this for her and in the lowest position she makes the basket every time! And, as she gets better and taller we can increase the net height to challenge her. And in a few short years she will be able to play hoop with the big kids!
customer_reviews.author: D J Biggens

customer_reviews.title: Faulty parts
customer_reviews.text: This sucks if your child is over 3 years old. The lack to keep the Cory set at a certain level does not lock in place. I had to use some duct tape to keep it at 6 ft. Also the actual pole that holds the court is weak and folded over within 10 days of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marquis J.

customer_reviews.title: Dysfunctional piece
customer_reviews.text: Within a few days of using this, the red piece that adjust the height no longer functions. As a result, the basketball hoop falls from each setting. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Weinshall

customer_reviews.title: Great Toddler Hoop!!
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 yr old is OBSESSED with basketball. We bought him the smaller Little Tikes version first but has already out grown that. We were a little concerned that this wouldn't be a significant enough step up, but it's actually perfect! We automatically had to set it to the second highest level which still leaves a little room for growth. I don't expect him to grown out of this one for at least a year and a half or so 😊 I also love that this particular version doesn't require sand or water to hold it in place. The cross style bottom is very stable all things considered. And most importantly my son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Boy Mommy & Family Superhero

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hoop for Small Kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoop for my basketball loving three year old grandson Simon. After he helped me put it together (took about 20 minutes), he took to it like a little Steff Curry. It should work for him (and probably every adult guest) for several years. Both purchaser and future NBA point guard seem happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Timbo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My nephews love to play basketball so this is a perfect gift for inside play and all of the kids love it and it hasn’t broken yet with 5 crazy boys 😀
customer_reviews.author: Alyson

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Gift for nieces. They play with it a lot. Good height for 3 & 7yr old
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Way better quality than competitors'
customer_reviews.text: A bunch of our friends each has different basketball hoops for their kids. We spent a tiny bit more on this one and are super happy with it. The quality is amazing and its adjustable height is far better than the other brands/versions we've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Hutchy

customer_reviews.title: Step 2 Scores a 3-Pointer with this Goal!
customer_reviews.text: This goal rocks! Great quality! I did the research on this particular goal vs. its main competitor (Fisher-Price)- and, hand's down, the positive reviews consistently leaned toward this model. BEYOND pleased with this purchase. Not only does my toddler love it...but our whole family uses it/loves it, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old and his buddies all love this thing. They spend hours dunking on each other inside when it’s snowing or too cold to play basketball outside.
customer_reviews.author: Saltwater

customer_reviews.title: Well made and looks good too.
customer_reviews.text: My young grandsons play with this while the bigger boys use our standard size set up. So far it has held up very well outside.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality... will have for a long time... my 3 year old loves it... and so does my husband... very durable... made extremely well... great purchase... very very pleased... ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Fashion Forward

customer_reviews.title: It is a great way to get kids active
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old nephew, and he absolutely loves it. It is a great way to get kids active, and it is a wonderful beginners hoop.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great for indoor excercise as well as outdoors .  Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My grands love it ! It is now in their basement because of all the snow they have outdoors .
customer_reviews.author: mmg

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Got this for Great Grandson 3rd Birthday.....Very sturdy and easy to assemble. Love the fact that this can "GROW" with him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is great overall, however the plastic clasps on the side ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great overall, however the plastic clasps on the side don’t clip in and so over time the hoop just slides back down so I have to keep adjusting it back up. Otherwise, it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor and outdoor toy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent indoor and outdoor toy. Especially for the summer. I like how high it goes. Kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: rina p.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the grandkids!
customer_reviews.text: Little trouble to put on the backboard but the quick use of some pliars helping get it on.
customer_reviews.author: Jsteele972

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved so much they took home with them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandsons which are 4 and 18 mo. The 4 yr old is tall and hoop is very easy to adjust up and down. Assembly was quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great basketball set
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down one of the best toy purchases I have made. I bought this for my grandson three years ago and he plays with it every time he comes over. It is nice because it’s adjustable so kids and adults can play. The whole family can have fun.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't say its "Pro"
customer_reviews.text: Its definitely not a "pro" anything.. not even close to regulation. It is very easy to dunk since its so short.
customer_reviews.author: Great Dictator

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what it is. You will have a problem locking it into an adjusted height, but my workaround has been bungee cords. It keeps the stem locked into place.
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect buy
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this hoop. It was exactly what we were hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: jane lee

customer_reviews.title: B ball star quality
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it. Good, tough quality for my 4 year old. Nice height and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Nice adjustable hoop
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a growing toddler being adjustable on height. Basketball it comes with is a little cheaper but no biggie.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a very good option for younger kids and reasonable.
customer_reviews.text: In general, this is a good choice for toddlers through maybe 8 years old. The hooks on the basket that hold the net could be a little sturdier, but it's really versatile and works well indoors as well as outside.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and gift for kids.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty awesome! Multiple hieghts means it can be used for quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley H

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great basketball goal for a growing kid. We bought this for our son’s 3rd birthday. It was easy to assemble & seems very sturdy & reliable. It’s a little hard to lower but overall 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have a pump if you buy this.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t even come with a pump for that ball. So it’s been sitting in my garage since Christmas. So I can’t review much else since he can’t play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Carina Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great basketball goal!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great basketball set. It is sturdy and easy to put together. Our kids love it. It has held up well so far. The ball that comes with it isn’t that great.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: The hoop doesn't fall in place properly and height adjustment is not tight
customer_reviews.author: P V R

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this since you can adjust the height can't wait till Christmas to see my grandson face
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We are both happier after trading
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than expected (my fault). Actually traded with a friend who had the smaller size as we have a two year old and her kid is 4.5 years. We are both happier after trading.
customer_reviews.author: rebekah hewitt

customer_reviews.title: My son Loves It
customer_reviews.text: A great toy to burn off energy around the house. My two year old loves it. I would just recommend purchasing some additional basketballs. We like having more than one to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: This thing is the best! We have it set up in our living ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the best! We have it set up in our living room, if you can believe that. The height adjusts easily, and it's just a ton of fun for the whole family - especially in the winter months when we just can't get outside. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for indoors or outdoors!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 year old grandson loves playing basketball! It's been nice during the winter months for him to be able to play in our basement!
customer_reviews.author: TObee7

customer_reviews.title: Great hoop for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great hoop for kids,easy to put together - would be nice if it came with more than just 1 ball.
customer_reviews.author: MTICoach

customer_reviews.title: The pole falls down too easy. Should have a better way to push it ...
customer_reviews.text: The pole falls down too easy. Should have a better way to push it in to hold it at the height you want.
customer_reviews.author: sheila

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value that I think will last for years
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, heavy plastic feels sturdy, and you can easily adjust height up to 7'. I think we'll get years of use from this.
customer_reviews.author: GA4001

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Needs two people to raise the hoop but that won't be done for a long time and I can plan ahead to do that. Strong hoop. Almost too tall for my 2 1/2 year old Grandson but wouldn't want it smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaning Basketball Hoop
customer_reviews.text: Leans too much forward, but for the price, the kids will love it. Doubt it will last more than a couple of years but that's all the time I need.
customer_reviews.author: S. Harper

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: Grandson is four, loves it winter time inside we will move it out to the highest level when summer hits
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We set this up inside in our play area. It’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa B

customer_reviews.title: Good indoor activity for hot summer days
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for 6 year old grandchild. He enjoys shooting baskets indoors during our over 100 degree days. Product arrived a day earlier than promised.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Akroosh

customer_reviews.title: Slam dunk
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves her gift. She’s had it for two months and plays with it almost daily. The slam dunk is harder than you think to make the net go down.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy L Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought other similar basketball goals in the past and this one seems much more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yr old son loves this!! Is great to grow into. It’s a little tall for him but it doesn’t stop him. Definitely recxonend
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great basketball hoop for kids
customer_reviews.text: Really nice toy hoop. Easy to assemble and will last for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Albert Case

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful fun!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, sturdy hoop Our 4 year old and his 16 year old brother love it The basement is their "court"
customer_reviews.author: Tami Valencia

customer_reviews.title: He loved it. It is sturdy enough for a 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandsons 3rd birthday. He loved it. It is sturdy enough for a 3 year old, and expands so he will be able to use it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Debra B. Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good gift for a child. Sturdy and fun to.play with.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Fontela

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the basketball goal for my now 5 year-old ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the basketball goal for my now 5 year-old niece and she LOVES it! The assembling of the goal was simple.
customer_reviews.author: B Brun

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have three boys...ages 4 , 5 and 7. They all love it and it's great how its adjustable .
customer_reviews.author: danielle jos

customer_reviews.title: No pump included
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with pump to blow up the ball. Besides that it's a great basketball hoop which I expect to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and my godson loves it. According to his mom he spends hours on it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin K Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this and I love it grows with her!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Very sturdy. My 2 1/2 yr old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Selly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together. Really sturdy and well made. Grandchildren love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Black

customer_reviews.title: Very fast Delivery
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was very fast. I sent it to my grandson for a birthday gift. It has not been put together yet as he will wake up to it on his birthday but I am sure he will love it.
customer_reviews.author: shauna

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves it, her big brothers are 11 and 14 and they love it. I babysit a 7 year old boy and he loves it as well. You can't go wrong. It's a great toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome awesome awesome!! My 2 1/2 year old LOVES his "basketball hoot". This thing is so cool! Sturdy and will grow with him. We are stoked.
customer_reviews.author: N Hiser

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for myself. It goes up to six feet tall and all day me and my friends were dunking on it! Very fun to play with even for 6th graders! Very sturdy and very fun! (Tip, put sand instead of water)
customer_reviews.author: Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Great for two year old toddler and older
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together ... at lowest height setting ... great for indoor use even a toddler .... expandable for older children and move outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kotz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves playing basketball!!! Sturdy but lightweight so can move it around easily but it doesn't blow over in the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality of life improvement
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is 6 years old and has lots of fun shooting baskets and slam dunking.
customer_reviews.author: Blaster Fan

customer_reviews.title: Grows with your child.
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I was looking for my grandsons so they would get outside more. It will fit them for years as it heightens as they age.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great hoop.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect hoop for a toddler. Doesn’t tip and was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Its a lot bigger than I expected, Its for my 4 year old for Christmas so I haven't opened it yet but from the looks of it, it looks nice. Hopefully its durable.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Arrived one day earlier than expected, was a gift for my four-year-old grandson. He absolutely loves it. Good quality and easy to assemble.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!

product_meta.title: Step2 Shootin' Hoops Pro Basketball Set
product_meta.description:
This adjustable basketball hoop for kids is a great sports toy for active play and grows with your child. The Step2 Shootin' Hoops Pro Basketball Set can be used inside a playroom at its shortest height or outside in the backyard at its tallest height. Toddlers and preschoolers will develop their gross motor skills and exercise as they run, catch, and shoot the basketball into the hoop. This basketball hoop for toddlers makes it easy for little ones to play with friends, learning to take turns and share the basketball. Plus, the wide breakaway rim with real woven net is perfect for kids to slam dunk and score with ease! Made in USA of US and imported parts.

BRAND STORY
By

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Shoot hoops like a pro and promote active play with the adjustable Shootin' Hoops Pro Basketball Set. The center pole fixture can be adjusted to a height of 48", 60", or 72". Other features include a large backboard with a break away rim and real woven net. Also includes a large stable base that can be weighted down with sand or water (not included). The base has built in drink holders.

See more
feature_bullets: Get ready for active sports play with your toddler and the Shootin’ Hoops Pro Basketball Set by Step2!
Oversized backboard and wide-rim breakaway hoop make it easy and fun for toddlers and preschoolers to shoot the basketball into the hoop.
Basketball hoop toy for toddlers is adjustable from 48 in. (121.9 cm.) up to 72 in. (182.9 cm.).
Base can be weighed down for extra stability with sand or water (sand and water not included).
In the box: Adjustable basketball hoop with base and basketball.
